attributes.additional_details:
Remember "The NHS is safe in our hands?" It's not at all. The NHS has been gradually prepared for privatisation for four decades. 
Assets have been sold off and leased back to the NHS at exhorbitant rents. Private providers have been allowed in and have turned healthcare into a marketised commodity. Some treatments are already being dropped with people being told to pay privately. The NHS belongs to the people of Britain, not the government.
attributes.background: Make the Secretary of State for Health responsible for providing a fully publicly funded, fully integrated, National Health Service, free at the point of need.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/598732
